work.name: Accenture solutions ptd ltd
work.summary: Worked at Scottish Power Gas and Energy on legacy migrations with Deloitte, facilitating ODATA and ABAP script development. Developed Inbound/Outbound Interfaces using CPI, Proxies, and EDI to extract CU master data and transmit between legacy applications and ERP via REST API calls. Executed 15 ad hoc queries monthly, resolving 80% of system exceptions, and reprocessed failed IDOCs, achieving a 75% success rate in new connections and a 40% error reduction. Generated weekly and monthly KPI reports, enhanced middleware performance, and achieved 85% accuracy in tracking new connections.
highlights: Awarded a Customer Appreciation Bonus for best performer of the month within two months into the project.

education.institution: Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad, India

certificates.name: Python for Data science, AI and Development

projects.name: Abstract Summarization using Transformer Model
projects.summary: Developed an abstract summarization model using Transformer architecture with Python, Pegasus, TensorFlow, Hugging Face, and NLTK. Conducted model inferencing with a summarization pipeline, applying tokenization and batch processing to optimize data readiness. Evaluated model performance using the Rouge metric and integrated a data collator for effective sequence-to-sequence learning. Validated and fine-tuned the model on a test dataset, confirming enhanced summarization capabilities.

projects.name: Sentiment Analysis with NLP
projects.summary: Pre-processed text data with tokenization, lemmatization, stemming, and stop-words removal. Used TF-IDF for word relevance. Applied LinearSVC, BernoulliNB, MultinomialNB, Logistic Regression, and Random Forest Classifier for sentiment analysis. Visualized trends in Tableau.

projects.name: Property Rental Management System
projects.summary: Designed and implemented a centralized property rental management system using Oracle Database and Oracle Data Modeler. The system monitored user activity, managed user privileges, and automated key rental and maintenance tasks, enhancing operational efficiency and data management.
